thread.title: AV Concepts & Cvent to Host Highly-Anticipated Meetings Focus Webinar on 2016 Event Tech Trends
thread.title_full: AV Concepts & Cvent to Host Highly-Anticipated Meetings Focus Webinar on 2016 Event Tech Trends - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: AV Concepts & Cvent to Host Highly-Anticipated Meetings Focus Webinar on 2016 Event Tech Trends
text:
Don't miss this joint webinar, The Future in Focus: 5 Event Tech Trends in 2016, on Thursday October 15th at 1:00 PM EDT
SAN DIEGO, Calif. (PRWEB) October 05, 2015
AV Concepts, a leader in creative and technical event solutions, is thrilled to partner with Cvent on a highly-anticipated new Meetings Focus webinar this October called, The Future in Focus: 5 Event Tech Trends in 2016 .
This joint webinar will explore five event technology trends set to dominate live events in 2016. From wearables and beacons, to the latest in experiential event technology, attendees will gain the knowledge they need to keep their events relevant in 2016 and beyond.
In this hour-long session, Curt Apanovich, Creative Director at AV Concepts, and Kevin Yanushefski, Product Marketing Manager at Cvent, will help event professionals:
 Discover the latest immersive A/V trends, including 4K Ultra HD, Projection Mapping and Holographic Effects Explore tools for successfully implementing real-time social media integration and sharing Learn how new event management tools can help planners run smarter events via instant attendee insight and feedback
When: Thursday, October 15th at 1:00 PM EDT
Where: Register online today: http://bit.ly/RegFutureinFocuswebinar
About AV Concepts
AV Concepts partners with brands, their experiential marketing agencies, and production partners to deliver creative and technical event solutions. We offer a collaborative, in-house approach for general sessions, keynote productions and experiential marketing activations including creative, engineering, technology and staging. From intimate events to large user conferences, we grow and evolve with our clients as their needs adapt and change. And we’re always pushing the envelope, leveraging new technologies, or inventing our own, to ensure we’re creating immersive experiences that dazzle audiences and drive business results. Visit http://www.avconcepts.com to learn how we can partner with you on your next event, or follow us on Twitter @avconceptsinc , LinkedIn , or YouTube .
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13001454.htm
